Type Method# build_Conditional(_:_:_:)

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
static func build_Conditional<Test, If, Else>(
    _ test: Test,
    _ trueBranch: If,
    _ falseBranch: Else
) -> PredicateExpressions.Conditional<Test, If, Else> where Test : PredicateExpression, If : PredicateExpression, Else : PredicateExpression, Test.Output == Bool, If.Output == Else.Output
```
